nodes.bodyText:
We should think about this again. Is it OK that we are NOT returning all the information that we have in the PrivateTransactionReceipts? E.g. the logs do not contain the privateFrom and privateFor/privacyGroupID.
AND I'm not sure about the TransactionIndex that is contained in our results/logs, because they are not the index of the PMT, but they contain 0 for the first PMT of the privacy group in the block, 1 for the second PMT and so on.

When users are dealing with logs, they are interested inthe outcome of the smart contracts. The privateFrom doesn’t matter.
And they know the privacy group id ’cause they need it to subscribe to the logs in the first place.
The transaction index is a good point though. We should consider using the PMT index
But this isn't part of this PR. We should do it in a separate one :)
